name: Debonaire - Day Break - BelicosoÂ
additionalNotes: Debonaire Day Break is an Ultra Premium cigar blended by Philip S. Zanghi, founder of Indian Tobacco Cigar Co., and Daniel Sinclair, founder of Dufort Holdings. After 20 years in the cigar industry, Zanghi blends the finest, darkest air cured tobacco from Nicaragua and Dominican Republic and pairs it with an Ecuadorian Connecticut Shade wrapper to make a full flavored, first class smoke.
